registerDescription: Fill in the details to create your account
resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link
invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
invalidPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters
invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

resetPasswordCheckEmail: Check your email for instructions to reset your password.
passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully!
canLoginWithNewPassword: You can now login with your new password.
